name: MTLStorageMode
desc: Options for the memory location and access permissions for a resource.

items.name: case shared
items.desc: The resource is stored in system memory and is accessible to both the CPU and the GPU.

items.name: case managed
items.desc: The CPU and GPU may maintain separate copies of the resource, and any changes must be explicitly synchronized.

items.name: case `private`
items.desc: The resource can be accessed only by the GPU.

items.name: case memoryless
items.desc: The resourceâ€™s contents can be accessed only by the GPU and only exist temporarily during a render pass.
